attributes.action: Gaining an electoral advantage by deception should be made a criminal offence.
attributes.additional_details: Democracy is delicate and precious, and for whatever reason, what I hope is a small minority seem to play fast and loose with the truth.
attributes.background: I want legislation to be enacted that compels elected members to be honest with the electorate.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions which call for similar actions: 

Amend the Recall of MPs Act 2015 for MPs who have misled voters
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/703329

Impose penalties on MPs for deceit 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/703882
